select board_no as no, board_title as title, board_writer as writer, board_password as password, board_content as content, board_filename as filename, board_likes as likes, board_deleted as deleted, board_created_date as createdDate, board_updated_date as updatedDate, board_deleted_date as deletedDate from spring_free_boards where board_deleted = 'N' and board_no = #{value} order by board_no desc
